name: auto-comment-line
description: Automatically adds a line comment on the next line after only one line or after only two lines with a single line comment.

auto-comment-line.afterTwoLines.description: When enabled, a new comment line is inserted when two previous lines also contain a comment line.

auto-comment-line.doubleSlashLangs.description: List of languages where the comment character is a double slash: //

auto-comment-line.tripleSlashLangs.description: List of languages where the comment character is a triple slash: ///

auto-comment-line.hashLangs.description: List of languages where the comment character is a hash: #

auto-comment-line.semicolonLangs.description: List of languages where the comment character is a semicolon: ;

auto-comment-line.doubleHyphenLangs.description: List of languages where the comment character is a double hyphen: --
